name: Super Mario World: The Legend of Zelda: The Mini Quest
overview: It's TLoZ 35th anniversary! What about a SMW hack to celebrate? This hack is based on The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker, with references from other games of the franchise. Now go save Zelda once again! Features some 4 layered backgrounds, Mode 7 and true hi-res "boss defeated" screens.
